iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
static func value(
    _ labelResource: LocalizedStringResource,
```

Available when `DataValue` conforms to `Plottable`.
